articles.content: Theres a revolutionary new spray-on coating that could make returning to some semblance of normally much safer. The antimicrobial coating not only kills COVID, but it also protects the surface its applied to from contamination for up to 90 days. New Yorks Tra… [+229 chars]

articles.title: 17 COVID-19 cases linked to house party in Olmsted County - KARE 11
